> He planted his sword in the ground than backed off a little before
> his
> thousands of pieces moved to form something else. His mechanical tail
> was long and seemed like a heavy flail, his wings seemed to have been
> made to shred things up, and he seemed to look like a standing
> skeleton the way his armor covered him. His neck was extended, but
> not
> so much as theirs. His horns started drilling and he opened his jaws
> for a massive roar... followed by an equally massive blast of energy
> aimed at the leftmost enemy. Without waiting, he took the sword out
> of
> the Moon's rocky soil and brandished it menacingly.
> 
> AzureBlade: You amuse me Minions. You show yourselves as tough, but
> are really nothing like the real deal. You won't amuse me for long.


OOC: Are you in the form of a dragon brandishing a sword, or something
else?

As the minions get closer, thier form become clearer. They do indeed
resemble dragons at first: They have the wings, the tails and head, but
only the rear legs and small front legs. (Think wyvern or drake) Like
shadows they streak through the skies even as Azureblade's death
dealing breath scortches one of them, sending it spinning in long
looping circles, its armor crisping under the assault!

Agile as birds and yet as domininat as lions the other two circle for a
moment and then one of them alights on the ground shifting form as he
does so. Even as the other circles like a vulture waiting for its prey
to fall.

In the intermittent light the new commer's armor is a reflective silver
and ebony black. Standing a few arm lengths away his stance is large
and agressive, red horns rising from his helm, as black wings flare
from his back. Sharp spikes of armor extend from his shoulder plating
as cannon mounts rest on his pectoral chestplates. In one hand he
wields a wickedly curved sword nearly as large as he is a strangly
reflective black!

"Your ammusment will fade with your life functions. You face Animus
first blade of Vorpal." With a deliberate motion he points the sword at
Azureblade even as his the outside calf plates of his armor open up and
release a flurry of rockets at Azureblade.

Preston
(Animus)
